attributes.action: ensure that schools raise awareness of mental issues such as aspergers syndrome and dyslexia.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As an aspergers syndrome sufferer i think more could be done to help people with mental issues. I think there is not enough understanding of people with mental health problems such as dyslexia, dyspraxia, aspergers syndrome, anxiety, depression ect.
